titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: PREFERRED COMMUNICATION LANGUAGE (Retired) - Description

div.p: This item has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary as it is no longer required forÂ any data set.

p.b: The last live version of this item is available in the July 2015 release of the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.
Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
